wikipedia_page.main: Henry Cowans (born 1 October 1996) is an English footballer who last played as a midfielder for Telford United.

response: Tonge struggled for game time at the start of the 2016–17 season, but was praised by manager Darren Sarll for working with youngsters Henry Cowans and Dale Gorman in training. He scored one goal from 31 games as Stevenage improved on the previous campaign to finish in tenth spot, before he was released in May 2017.
